library(tidyverse)
library(randomcoloR)

palette <- distinctColorPalette(11)
set.seed(3333)
palette <- randomColor(count = 11)

#随机生成颜色

library(RColorBrewer)
qual_col_pals = brewer.pal.info[brewer.pal.info$category == 'qual',]
#处理后有73种差异还比较明显的颜色，基本够用
col_vector = unlist(mapply(brewer.pal, qual_col_pals$maxcolors, rownames(qual_col_pals)))

cancerNum <- read.table('/home/luohh/MNVAnalysis/01.GWAS/02.Cancer/01.Data/02.PhenoData/cancerSample.txt',header = F,stringsAsFactors = F,sep = "\t")

colnames(cancerNum) <- c("SampleNumber","CancerClass")
cancerNum$CancerClass <- factor(cancerNum$CancerClass,levels = cancerNum$CancerClass[order(cancerNum$SampleNumber,decreasing = T)])


ggplot(cancerNum,aes(x=CancerClass,y=SampleNumber,fill=palette))+
  geom_bar(stat = 'identity')+
  theme_classic()+
  ylab(label = "The number of individuals")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45,hjust = 1.0,color = 'black',size = 14,face = 'bold'),
        axis.text.y = element_text(color = 'black',size = 14,face = 'bold'),
        axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.title.y = element_text(color = 'black',size = 20,face = 'bold'),
        legend.position = "")+
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0, 300))
